title: The Great Gatsby
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald
description: A classic novel set in the 1920s about wealth and love.

title: A Brief History of Time
author: Stephen Hawking
description: Exploring the nature of space and time, this book delves into cosmology.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: An epic tale of politics, religion, and survival on the desert planet Arrakis.

title: To Kill a Mockingbird
author: Harper Lee
description: A profound look at racism and morality in the American South.

title: The Selfish Gene
author: Richard Dawkins
description: An exploration of evolutionary biology and the concept of the 'gene-centered' view of evolution.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel about a society under complete surveillance and control.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A look into the history of humankind, from ancient ancestors to modern society.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
author: J.D. Salinger
description: A story about teenage rebellion and the struggles of adolescence.

title: The Art of War
author: Sun Tzu
description: An ancient Chinese text on strategy and warfare.

title: The Lord of the Rings
author: J.R.R. Tolkien
description: A high-fantasy epic about the journey to destroy a powerful ring.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: Insights into the two systems that drive the way we think and make decisions.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
author: Douglas Adams
description: A comedic science fiction adventure through space.

title: Harry Potter and The Philosopher's Stone
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry discovers he's a wizard and faces dark forces at Hogwarts.

title: Harry Potter and The Chamber Of Secrets
author: J.K. Rowling
description: A hidden chamber is opened, threatening students' safety at Hogwarts.

title: Harry Potter and The Prisoner Of Azkaban
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry learns about his past while evading a dangerous escaped prisoner.

title: Harry Potter and The Goblet Of Fire
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry enters a deadly magical tournament and uncovers a sinister plot.

title: Harry Potter and The Order Of The Phoenix
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry confronts a corrupt Ministry and prepares for Voldemort’s return.

title: Harry Potter and The Half-Blood Prince
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry uncovers Voldemort’s past to learn his enemy’s deepest secrets.

title: Harry Potter and The Deathly Hallows
author: J.K. Rowling
description: Harry’s final battle against Voldemort unfolds, deciding the wizarding world’s fate.

title: The Seven Husbands of Evelyn Hugo
author: Taylor Jenkins Reid
description: A Hollywood icon's life story, filled with passion, scandal, and love.

title: Project Hail Mary
author: Andy Weir
description: A thrilling sci-fi adventure with a lone astronaut on a mission to save Earth.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a young woman's journey from a survivalist family to Cambridge University.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
author: Delia Owens
description: A murder mystery set in the North Carolina marshlands.

title: Chainsaw Man
author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
description: A young man with the power to transform into Chainsaw Man fights devils.

title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
author: Koyoharu Gotouge
description: A boy embarks on a quest to save his sister and slay demons.

title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones.

title: The Midnight Library
author: Matt Haig
description: A woman finds herself in a library between life and death, with a chance to try out different lives.

title: Berserk
author: Kentaro Miura
description: A dark fantasy saga of Guts, a lone mercenary, seeking revenge against supernatural forces.

title: Can't Hurt Me
author: David Goggins
description: A story of mental toughness and perseverance by a Navy SEAL turned endurance athlete.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: The memoir of former First Lady Michelle Obama, reflecting on her life and achievements.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A psychological thriller about a woman who stops speaking after being accused of murder.

title: The Vanishing Half
author: Brit Bennett
description: The story of twin sisters who live in two very different worlds, exploring identity and family.

title: Spy x Family
author: Tatsuya Endo
description: A spy forms a fake family for a mission, but his new 'family' has secrets of their own.

title: One Piece
author: Eiichiro Oda
description: A group of pirates seeks the legendary One Piece treasure on a high-seas adventure.

title: The Lean Startup
author: Eric Ries
description: A guide on how to build a sustainable business using lean methodologies.

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
description: A self-help book about embracing life's challenges with realism and resilience.
